downloadTitle: Download: Microsoft Azure StorSimple 8000 Series Appliance Step-by-Step Deployment Guide
downloadDescription: This guide describes how to configure your StorSimple 8000 series devices, and includes a pre-installation checklist, configuration prerequisites, and detailed configuration steps. It is recommended that prior to using this guide, you have unpacked, rack-mounted and cabled your StorSimple device as per the instructions in Microsoft Azure StorSimple Getting Started guides.
detailsSection:
This downloadable pdf file contains the latest guidance needed when deploying an Azure StorSimple 8000 Series Appliance in your datacenter.

This guide describes how to configure your StorSimple 8000 series device, and includes a pre-installation checklist, configuration prerequisites, and detailed configuration steps.

This guide is based on the content exported from online MSDN on Novemeber 20, 2014. For the most up-to-date deployment content, go to http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521438
systemRequirementsSection: These guides can be downloaded and opened on any system that has a pdf viewer installed.
installInstructionSection: Save the file locally on your system and double-click to open it with a pdf viewer.
